verses.roman:
eka dina mleccha-rājāra ucca-ṭuṅgite
cikitsāra vāt kahe tāṅhāra agrete

synonyms: eka dina—one day; mleccha-rājāra—of the Mohammedan King; ucca-ṭuṅgite—on a high platform; cikitsāra vāt—talk of medical treatment; kahe—was speaking; tāṅhāra agrete—before him.
translation: "One day Mukunda dāsa, the royal physician, was seated with the Mohammedan King on a high platform and was telling the King about medical treatment.
